Never pay from your credit card. The worst customer care in this place. If something happens with the payment they never resolve it. We have to do everything. They never accept their fault. There is no one to complain also, Owner or Manager is not in the shop or no supervisor or any one two complain the problems. My wife brought some medicine from this place and, sales women punch my wife credit card twice from there two card machines. But the receipt only comes from one machine. So my wife not checks it. But when we went home my wife saw that there is two transaction in same amount to Gagana pharmacy pannipitiya. So we called the Gagana pharmacy and told them that there is a two truncation for their pharmacy. They check it but said no there is only one transaction is done. So we went to our bank and update the book and went to the Gagana Pharmacy. In that time they called their boss and told the problem and call the bank that's mean when we called them they never check it. The payment is only for Rs. 590.00. When my wife in phone with their bank this sales girls saying this type of matters happens in every time with customers but this is only for Rs 590.00. They talk like we are just some kind of cheap persons. Rs. 590.00 are our money. Why we pay more money for them. Gagana Pamachy is a not a begging or charity company it‚Äôs a Profitable company. Then the owner came and willing to pay Rs 590.00 in cash. But I said I do not need your money call your bank and transfer it to our bank. Very Very Bad customer care service in this place. And never pay from your credit card on this place (sales girls saying this type of matters happens in every time).

Good and faithful service. Compounding, Dispensing of drugs on prescription to the patients with care, accuracy and legality, Counseling and appropriate procurement, storage, dispensing and documentation of medicines are well manage in this place. They are counseling of the patient at the time of dispensing of prescription and Non- prescription drugs. Demonstrate the proper use of devices.

Good. I love this place

Good alternative to Hemas pharmacy if prescribed medicine, to avoid queues and crowds. The only challenge is this has a weird parking space, and also gets crowded.
The lady at the counter today was extremely helpful to my wife who went to buy the meds.

On 29th Aug 2020 at around 4: 30pm, i went to all the way to thalawathugoda Healthguard pharmacy to buy a Knee Stabilizer (oppo 1035) for my mother. I was searching this in many places but was nt available. My mother was seriously suffering as doctor advised to wear it when she is walking to avoid least the pain. My concern is this when i entered i spoke to one of staff with a beared n wearing a pink shirt (i guess he is the incharge may be). When i inquire and ask for it point blank without any interest to see even the stock with no interest whilst he was doing his work Said thts not available. Funny thing when i asked to check with other HG outlets he said no point as he its confired the stockes are not available. Finally with such dissapoint i was just walking in to display cabinet and accidentally noticed its available with exact number. Thn i spoke to another pharmacist and asked to check with my priscription. Je confirmed thts the same. Then i measure my mother thie size its exactly OK. I was so happy. That guy was hidden himself looking at me least never bother to appologise. Finally i tols hoa what i wanted is available though u said NO. PLS PAY YOUR ATTENTION SPECIALY IN YOUR BUSINESS. CAUSE WE ARE NOY WALKING IN TO FOOD CITY OR SUPERMARKETS. Understand your Job role and impotanace of your technical assistant for needy people. ATTENTION TO MANAGEMENT
***** Appreciate the quick response of HG unit incharge Ms. Oshini to acknowledge the genuine concern of regret and to assure not let any room to repeat such mistake with gross negligence.
Customer service is paramount
Thank you.
Pharmacy with mini supermarket facility. Parking facilities are bad with near the main road front and bend. Price is moderate.
Okay had to wait for like 10 mini to get the attention from the staff they dont know to handle customers when the place is busy. Place is good.they have clutches too.
Well organized pharmacy, after recent renovation. Pretty much all the drugs are available, including well known brands. Enough parking for smaller vehicles, not for larger once.

One of the best pharmacies I have seen and interior and lighting is very attractive. Friendly staff and you can have some quick groceries, electronics even stationary as well. Place has 4 or 5 parking slots and slot space is not enough for large cars.

Reliable service. Located in a main city area. Easy access to the location. Good, friendly staff.

Conveniently located on Galle Road. Can get a variety of consumables and medicines at very reasonable rates. The shop is very clean, well-maintained and air-conditioned. The staff is very friendly and is ready to help. Items are organised and displayed for easy access and convenience.
They have most of the stuff that‚Äôs unavailable in other Healthguard outlets. I was looking for some goat milk and found an abundance there.

Newly opened outlet from the same chain. You have parking for couple of vehicles only, and you may need to park roadside. Trained staff. Basic groceries also available.
Good place for medicines. All type of tablets, capsules, etc, are available. Parking space also there.
Good pharmacy. Customer service is up to the standard. Consists of all types of medicine (even for pets)

Please do not order online from these folks! I was shocked to see the warfarin medicines, CIPLA brand (heart medication) that was home delivered for someone that I know with the expiry date after a month, Mar/2023 and was delivered on 20230118. So for 2 years 84 tablets in a box was collecting dust in a shelf somewhere in India before they got delivered to Sri Lanka to put people here at risk. Always check the manufacturing/expiry date on all the medicines that you buy online/offline in Sri Lanka. It looks like India is cleaning up its medicines close to the expiry date with the help of online pharmacies in Sri Lanka. Please beware everyone, thanks!

Great and fast service‚Ä¶ I've been ordering medications from Canada to my mother who lives in Sri Lanka through Healthnet ‚Ä¶its next-level customer service‚Ä¶super fast delivery‚Ä¶ even during medication deficits in SL, Healthnet had all almost all the medicines‚Ä¶ it was so convenient‚Ä¶keep up the good work Healthnet. ‚Ä¶

I ordered online my mom‚Äôs diabetes medications for 3 months and they initially issued a quotation including all drugs for 3 months and in next moment they sent me another quotation issuing the drugs only for 1 month. Explanation was their management has decided to provide only 1 month supply per customer due to current situation in the country.
What a bummer!

During the lock down period, I was required to find some urgent medicine and the material was out of stock in almost all the Online Pharmacies. When I directly spoke to those shops, their response was negative and even when I said that I would pay extra to find it others were reluctant. In such a landscape HealthNet team figured out my requirement and got down the items without any additional charge. Also the lady at the customer service was extremely helpful in getting it down.

Best online medicine delivery service ever! Thank you healthnet for beign a very surpportive body to our busy lives! Top brand best quality medicine and the most excellent and the most friendliest customer service ever! Keep up your good work and i wish you to be in the top of the business/industry in the country! Introduce a membership card to your regular customers (like me) I received my fifth order as well and I will keep on odering my and my family members medicine from healthnet.lk in the future as well.try out yours and your loved ones medicine to get deliverd to you door step people! Trust me you people will be surprised with their service
Healthnet is convenience personified. They are efficient, responsible and caring and will always ensure the best in the way of customer service and satisfaction. Thoroughly impressed!
Great service, convenient & reliable. Team is professional and helpful
Terrible service. Unnatentive, unfriendly and overall make things so much harder than they need to be.

Very poor service, unfriendly and very unhelpful. I don't think I would want to go into place again. I wish others would also stay away to teach a lesson to these owners.
Very rude. Stay away from the shop and let us show him the power of customers.
Was able to get Lumigan 0.01 from them. Seems to be well stocked. Would be nice if the shelves were properly arranged. That would enable customers to walk arround freely.

The most unfriendly pharmacy I have come across so far. I was asked to come after 3 hours by the person at the counter informing me that the boss would be available by then to return my medicine with receipt. But when I returned back after 3 hours the "boss" completely refused to refund or exchange my medicine i purchased at this pharmacy. Unlike other pharmacies they do not even give 5% discount for cash purchases. This is the pharmacy I would advise everyone to avoid at any cost as they are really money minded despite making 40% nett profit from medicine sales.

They charge 3% extra for credit card payment. They should at least inform before they do his.list price was 6950/= ended up paying Rs 7125/=. The Difference is only Rs Rs 175 but still ther actions has prompted me not to patronize Raj Pharmacy anymore

Naming it as Pharmacy is very unfair. It is by far a Minimart. Well organized business. In addition to pharmaceuticals, they have chocolates, biscuits, coffees, sweets other medical related equipment.

They said will deliver the meds but took more than a day. The patient could have died by the time they sent it. If delivery was not an option then dnt do it. I had to call more than 10 times. Worst customer service ever.
They have given me best hospitality and service they are doing their job well. They having all the medical items. They surgical masks and panadol too.

Shockingly bad. Worse than any government office. My wife walked in to buy some pain relief balm, the only customer inside was seated and waiting and no one was being served at that moment. There were four staff members behind the counter with one male and three females. Despite my wife standing there no-one came to serve her, even when one staff member walked up-to her to talk to the customer behind her she refused to even look at my wife. My wife finally gave up and came back to the car and I went in, I went to the counter and had to talk loudly and call them, one girl reluctantly came to the counter and when I asked for the balm, she just went back to the group of people including the one male staff and they were all just grouped together giggling like school kids in a corner; including the man. This is so shockingly bad and unprofessional it doesn't feel real. How would these unprofessional staff manage to handle a customer who comes in with a serious requirement? These people aren't fit to work at a service that is considered essential; I honestly question if these people are even adults? The owner needs to have a look the CCTV footage if available and address the staff on how to behave at work. I was there sometime between 20: 35 and 20: 40 12th September 2023. These are the kind of people who end up running for government.

They almost have anything and everything. Have parking too.
Very good service from most of them.
Very Supportive and Friendly staff, can buy most of rare medicines which are difficult to find. Thanks a lot for your excellent service Ô∏è

Friendly staff. You can buy most of the general medicine here. Parking space available for 3 vehicles. May have a queue in peak hours, typically from 6 PM to 8 PM. They deliver medicine when provided prescription via WhatsApp.
Friendly customer service at anytime and there are very trustworthy. Special the owner, she is a nice person. Highly recommended.

Today I went and paid by card and got my medication, was about to leave when the lady who processed the payment ran out to the park and managed to stop me only to tell me they had charged me twice and apologized profusely. They compensated me for the overcharge and compensated instantly. It is amazing to see this level of honesty and integrity and I will keep coming back and recommend to everyone I know. Great attitude folks!
Not only do they have the medications that I need which aren't available in most other pharamcies in the area but they provide excellent customer service.

Asked for Vitamin C 500mg ones for 30 days. Earlier they used to send a chewable one this time it is not a chewable one and the price is high as well. They should at least ask about it before sending it out.
Thanks For the care taken when providing the medicine. Keep up the Good service.

People who are work there has to know that they have to give the service to the customers according to a line or who came first. I had had worst experience today. Delivered all of the medicine I wanted during curfew with the delivery pass. All the employees were extremely polite and very friendly. Delivered to my grandmother and my place but only charged one delivery fee since both houses were in the same area. Highly recommend.

Good honest and friendly service, from the fellows, that work at Asian Pharma!

I was expecting too be ripped off or short changed, like the rest of my experience in Colombo?

4 stars, given only because of the rush in the store,
Better place and good customer service in a busy town,
The best pharmacy around, friendly staff and fast service,
Very helpful. Delivered all medicines without any issues even during covid 19 lock down. Great customer service.,
Small pharmacy but has all what you need. They donít limit the customers nor provide hand wash or sanitizers to their customers at the entry point despite the worsening COVID situation,
Good customer service. Most of the drugs are available. Credit card payment facility available. Limited parking space but can manage well in a not busy times. Road side parking available

Famous among the local community. Located near the J'pura hospital main entrance. Premises recently renovated, and equipped with all the drugs and healthcare accessories. East access from the New Hospital road. Parking along the roadsides.

They have a good collection of drugs, food items and pet food. Parking is available for about 3-4 vehicles.,

Friendly and attentive staff.

I never recommend this place, very rude for customers, the government departments are better in people treatment, nobody begs, people pay and buy, poor education on drugs and medicines, they give something else, please follow the prescriptions, all chaos, please avoid and find a better place with qualified people.
